mapper.select: SELECT r.record_num, r.reservation_date_time, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.state, r.bicycle_code, r.bicycle_type, r.rate_per_hour, r.duration_hours, r.total_amount, r.transaction_num, m.phone_number FROM T_ReservationInfo r JOIN T_MemberInfo m ON r.member_code = m.member_code WHERE r.member_code = #{memberCode} ORDER BY r.reservation_date_time DESC

SELECT r.record_num, r.reservation_date_time, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.state, r.bicycle_code, r.bicycle_type, r.rate_per_hour, r.duration_hours, r.total_amount, r.transaction_num, m.phone_number FROM T_ReservationInfo r JOIN T_MemberInfo m ON r.member_code = m.member_code WHERE r.record_num = #{recordNum}

SELECT r.record_num, r.reservation_date_time, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.state, r.bicycle_code, r.bicycle_type, r.rate_per_hour, r.duration_hours, r.total_amount, r.transaction_num, m.phone_number FROM T_ReservationInfo r JOIN T_MemberInfo m ON r.member_code = m.member_code WHERE r.transaction_num = #{transactionNum}

SELECT r.record_num, r.reservation_date_time, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.state, r.bicycle_code, r.bicycle_type, r.rate_per_hour, r.duration_hours, r.total_amount, m.phone_number, r.transaction_num FROM T_ReservationInfo r JOIN T_MemberInfo m ON r.member_code = m.member_code WHERE r.state = '예약완료' AND r.start_time <= #{currentDateTime}

SELECT r.record_num, r.reservation_date_time, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.state, r.bicycle_code, r.bicycle_type, r.rate_per_hour, r.duration_hours, r.total_amount, m.phone_number, r.transaction_num FROM T_ReservationInfo r JOIN T_MemberInfo m ON r.member_code = m.member_code WHERE r.state = '완료됨' AND r.end_time <= #{currentDateTime}
